20101208030555.714|20101208030557.143|CCO|WHAT CAN YOU TELL US? 
20101208030557.143|20101208030558.571|CCO|HOW IS THE FAMILY DOING? 
20101208030558.571|20101208030600.000|CCO|>> YOU KNOW, IT'S A HARD TIME.
20101208030600.000|20101208030602.000|CCO|BUT ELIZABETH DID AN AMAZING JOB

20101208030606.000|20101208030608.000|CCO|HOUSE IS DECORATED.
20101208030608.000|20101208030610.000|CCO|THEY'RE PREPARED FOR CHRISTMAS.

20101208030612.000|20101208030614.000|CCO|AND I THINK UNTIL THE VERY END, 
20101208030614.000|20101208030616.000|CCO|PROVIDE THEM WITH COMFORT AND 
20101208030616.000|20101208030618.000|CCO|DID EVERYTHING THAT A MOTHER 
20101208030618.000|20101208030620.000|CCO|COULD POSSIBLY DO TO PREPARE HER
20101208030620.000|20101208030621.429|CCO|CHILDREN FOR THIS DAY.
20101208030621.429|20101208030622.857|CCO|>> I DON'T WANT TO ASK TOO MANY 
20101208030622.857|20101208030624.286|CCO|QUESTIONS BECAUSE FRANKLY IT'S 
20101208030624.286|20101208030625.714|CCO|REALLY NONE OF OUR BUSINESS, BUT
20101208030625.714|20101208030627.143|CCO|TO THE DEGREE YOU CAN TALK ABOUT
